attributes.action: Ensure that Peter Kay, the comedian from Bolton, receives a Knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The comedian, Peter Kay, is without doubt, one of the funniest men in the country and with all his charity work, he has helped raise millions for very worthy charities.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
